segments.text: What kind of note are you taking there . That looks like doodle to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's picture association of the concept that the professor taught today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does that actually work for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't really know for sure yet . I'll tell you after the test on Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like to use shorthand note taking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was told once that the more time you spend writing , the less you are paying attention and so you miss stuff .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm . I never thought about it that way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One time I tried just listening , no notes , no pictures . I think I really learned more that day .
segments.speaker: S2
